name: Get Out (itch) (Cubers)
description:
Made for the August 2022 Pirate Software Game Jam, Get Out is a small game incorporating an escape room with dark/scary ambience. With little to guide you but your wits and perseverance, you'll have to journey through this mansion and find a way out, but not if the denizens of the darkness have anything to say about it.

Windows may give a warning when opening this game because it is not signed. Choose to open anyway if you'd like to play.
